snippet: The central bank has not changed its benchmark rate since March 2009. It also left unchanged a stimulus program of holding 375 billion pounds in government bonds.
abstract: Bank of England leaves benchmark interest rate unchanged at record low of 0.5 percent; also leaves in place stimulus program of holding 375 billion pounds, or almost $630 billion, in government bonds that it has purchased over the past five years.
lead_paragraph: The central bank has not changed its benchmark rate since March 2009. It also left unchanged a stimulus program of holding 375 billion pounds in government bonds.

headline.main: Bank of England Holds Key Rate at 0.5%
headline.print_headline: Bank of England Leaves Key Rate Unchanged at 0.5%
